text: BMW 3 Series is a car produced by BMW since 1975. It is currently in its seventh generation. The 3 Series has an M version in the form of the M3. The 3 Series has come in multiple body styles and engine types. The 3 Series has been sold as saloons, coup√©s, estates, and convertibles. The 3 Series is one of the most commonly-sold vehicles in the world.
